title: Petition to keep the Bilgewater ARAM map in circulation
body:
Please give us a 50/50 chance of battling in either Bilgewater or the Freljord when queueing up for ARAM.

Please upvote this if you agree!

replies.body: What do we want? A map worth fighting for!
i heard voices singing in my head while reading that xD
It's the only way to read it, really. In song!

WHAT DO WE WANT? 

A MP WORTH FIGHTING FOOOOOOOOOOR!

ARAMAM

All Random, All Mid, All Maps (Minus SR and TT)
A map with depth, that speaks to the mind?

Rotating between the two maps is a pretty good idea.

It would be nice to be able to play on the Bilgewater map/Howling Abyss at random. Like with the Harrowing/Snowdown Showdown maps had a 50/50 chance of being the map when you played during their events.

This is a good idea, because if the maps are random it promotes the randomness of the entire mode, and reminds the people who get some very good or very bad random champion selections, that it is ALL random chance.

Then we could introduce a system where a new ARAM map is featured for a while, then it becomes part of the regular map rotation.
This thread is the top-rated thread EVER of the Story & Art forum, with another thread now on the front page of "Bests" for the same topic, still we have no answers from Riot... what gives?
Yes to this. There's no reason why all this art should go to waste. Break the monotony of ARAM by allowing Bilgewater to be seen in the queue!
This post 600 upvotes, no red post, and it's on it's way to "the archive."  Maybe they heard and just didn't respond.
There should be a simple vote mechanic at the start of each ARAM game, where you can vote either of the maps for that specific game. if it goes 5-5, well, any ideas for that? Will it just randomize?
